column4: I want to install GRUB onto a USB Flash drive to boot a linux partition that I have on my HDD (long story short, I want to keep my HDD MBR for winXP, so if I unplug the USB, it boots winXP)
you can boot winxp with grub
GRUB boots 10.10 and windows 7 for me

I know, but on this particular system, when I installed ubuntu with GRUB it failed to see the winXP, it might have something to do with the fact that the winXP is actually a clone image from another HDD that I just moved across.
